name: Am I Alone?
description:
A top-down 2D survival horror game in which you wake up in a haunted house. Your only goal is to escape through various possible means. But it isn’t that easy, because you’re not alone, as some kind of a monster is lurking around and trying to hunt you down.

Created by Kalle Ranta, Mira Braxén and Saara Numelin.
